content: count 27sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner roun d 1 4 join in any corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc ch2 2hdc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1hdc in each of the next 28sts 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 28hdc per side 2hdc ch2 2hdc in each corner 25 round 1 5 note join a few stitches away from your corner for a neater finish remember to watch your gauge or go up half a hook size join around the post of any st from round 13 surface slip_stitch across each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 29 surface sl sts per side round 1 6 note if you increased hook size for last round remember to go back to original hook size join in any corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *skip the hidden st working blo make 1sc in each of the next 31sts 1sc ch2 1sc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 31sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 26 round 1 7 join in any corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc ch2 2dc in the same space * ch1 skip st 3dc-cluster in the next st 16 times ch1 skip st 2dc ch2 2dc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 16 3dc-cluster 17 ch1-spaces per side 2dc ch2 2dc in each corner round 1 8 join in any corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *1sc in each of the next 2sts 1sc in the ch1-space ch1 skip st 16 times 1sc in the next ch1-space 1sc in each of the next 2sts 1sc ch2 1sc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 21sc 16 ch1-spaces per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 27 round 1 9 join in any corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc ch2 2hdc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1hdc in each of the next 3sts 2hdc in the next ch1-space skip st 16 times 1hdc in each of the next 3sts 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the corner space * repeat
